TopicTitle: I love the new grass textures.

Articles.Content:
I know this is a small feature but I just wanted to say to whoever at Squad made the new ground textures, good job!

Look! I found Windows XP!
Agreed, they are awesome, it was the feature I was looking forward to the most in 0.25
so much better than the old green hell....

so much better than the old green hell....

http://s19.postimg.org/n7o8fvq83/screenshot953.png

Is that a TOG-2? :-o
Yeah I know right, also who knew that deserts had grass but only with a different color?! Its freaking fantastic! also the new Stretched-out Moon textures as well! Also terrific! (SmileyFace)

Sadly the desert seems to be grass now.

But for now lets pretend its a gigantic wheat field!

Sadly the desert seems to be grass now.

http://i.imgur.com/NsFWbMy.png

But for now lets pretend its a gigantic wheat field!

Savannah maybe?

Oh my goodness! How did i not notice this!!!!! Probably because i was too busy watching Jeb, Bob, and Bill screeming.

I thought there was something different about it. Well bye guys i'm off to appreciate it! *Sits staring at KSC grass for the next hour*

Is that a TOG-2? :-o

Nah, to short for a TOG-2
Yeah, but it makes the desert look weird.

so much better than the old green hell....

http://s19.postimg.org/n7o8fvq83/screenshot953.png

It looks like a stronk tank, one that is never late, nor early. This tank is always exactly in time. But beware, TOG has a lot of feelings too... This tank is no less than a TOG! (Words from a TOG owner )

so much better than the old green hell....

http://s19.postimg.org/n7o8fvq83/screenshot953.png

Looks like a Matilda II, or perhaps a Cromwell.

Looks like a Matilda II, or perhaps a Cromwell.

It's a TOG II.

They do look alot better even though it still look nothing like grass. But like others said the result of this change has also completely ruined the deserts. I rather have the ugly green mush back if they do not fix this. It seems like they just used the same exact texture and slapped a different colour on it.

Win XP ?? Oh the damn wallpaper. HAHAHA

The grass has improved. Who wants to play a game of hide n seek?

But for now lets pretend its a gigantic wheat field!

Or why not a huge, huge crop circle?

Having problems with ground scatter since 0.25. Some places look worse than 0.24.2.

But yeah, grass looks good, to bad it ate all the trees, and I don't see them no more.

Is that a TOG-2? :-o

yeah it is a TOG-2 XD

I rather have the ugly green mush back if they do not fix this. It seems like they just used the same exact texture and slapped a different colour on it.

Really? There is so little desert compared to grass on the planet. The desert isn't great but it's not that bad compared to how bad the grass used to be.

I thought there was something different about it. Well bye guys i'm off to appreciate it! *Sits staring at KSC grass for the next hour*

Grass is awesome. Looking at nature has psychological benefits, I wrote an essay on that recently. Not sure virtual nature is quite as effective. I tried to literally watch the grass grow with my pocket microscope once, but it didn't have high enough magnification.

Anyway, back on topic:

It looks a bit... interesting on some slopes, all line-y but I like it.

Though that is a pity about the desert. I haven't been there yet this version. I wonder if the snow is also effected?

The grass has improved. Who wants to play a game of hide n seek?

Interesting. Is this stock? I've been having similar issues with Kerbinside, but assumed that was because colliders have been simplired in the mod to save processing power or something.

Edited October 20, 2014 by Tw1

so much better than the old green hell....

Because tanks will make the grass better.

Wait, Is that wall with the KSC 2 now?

Cause Those definitely aren't wings.

Wait, Is that wall with the KSC 2 now?

Cause Those definitely aren't wings.

Probably the Kerbin Side mod, looks a lot like the Old KSC Upgrade...

Grass is awesome. Looking at nature has psychological benefits, I wrote an essay on that recently. Not sure virtual nature is quite as effective. I tried to literally watch the grass grow with my pocket microscope once, but it didn't have high enough magnification.

Well techniqually you did see the grass grow. It just wasn't enough for you to register it

Is that a TOG-2? :-o

How many parts? Damn it, I don't even want to know.

Never noticed the new grass. Watching Kerbals distort and DIE is too much fun.

Probably the Kerbin Side mod, looks a lot like the Old KSC Upgrade...

It is, the photo is re-used from a critique of that one I did for the maker of the mod. Putting things I learnt at uni to good use...

Edited October 20, 2014 by Tw1
